title: Clean sans
content:
Any ideas? I know i’ve used it once but can’t for the life of me remember what it is!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [rb-1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201175845/http:/typophile.com/files/rb-1.jpg) | 30.36 KB |

 [‹ Quantum of Solace type?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201175845/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49257 "Go to previous forum topic") [Frutiger? Arial? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201175845/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49239 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pjburgess

comments.content:
Looks like [Gotham Medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201175845/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_styles.php?itemID=200059&variantTypeID=&cpuCount=&productLineID=100008)  
If you don’t have it you may try [Avenir Medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201175845/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/avenir_std_65_medium/?sample_text=BEHIND%20THE%20SCENES) - it comes close - at least for the letters shown.
